text:
@AndrewMwenda One months ago, on March 27 there were 939 confirmed U.S. coronavirus deaths. Today, on April 27, there are now 55,415 confirmed U.S deaths and 987,322 confirmed cases.

President Magufuli sh'd be serious otherwise things may not end up well for Tanzanians & his neighbors.
